title: Using tech to help people
text: I am looking forward to being able to use the technology that I am learning in a way that will positively impact the people and world around me!

title: So tired
text: I am so tired from studying so mucy, but am also very motivated to continue to push through and reach my goals!

title: Pattern recognition
text: I am learning that pattern recognition is crucial in order to be able to become a good developer!
